018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.DEFAULT;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PROTECTED;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.createText;
027
028import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
029import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGText;
035
036/**
037 *  The wrapper for an
038 *  {@link Element}
039 *  instance that is contained in a
040 *  {@link TypeElement},
041 *  enhanced by information needed for the creation of the UML graph.
042 *
043 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
044 *  @version $Id: UMLMemberElement.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
045 *  @since 0.0.5
046*
047 *  @UMLGraph.link
048 */
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLMemberElement.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
051public abstract sealed class UMLMemberElement extends UMLElement
052    permits UMLExecutableElement, UMLVariableElement
053{
054        /*-----------*\
055    ====** Constants **========================================================
056        \*-----------*/
057    /**
058     *  An empty array of {@code UMLMemberElement} objects.
059     */
060    public static final UMLMemberElement [] EMPTY_UMLMemberElement_ARRAY = new UMLMemberElement [0];
061
062        /*------------*\
063    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
064        \*------------*/
065    /**
066     *  The
067     *  {@link SVGText}
068     *  element that display this member in the UML class diagram.
069     */
070    private final Lazy<SVGText> m_Text;
071
072        /*--------------*\
073    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
074        \*--------------*/
075    /**
076     *  Creates a new {@code UMLMemberElement} instance.
077     *
078     *  @param  element The wrapped element.
079     */
080    protected UMLMemberElement( final Element element )
081    {
082        super( element );
083        m_Text = Lazy.use( this::renderSVGText );
084    }   //  UMLMemberElement()
085
086        /*---------*\
087    ====** Methods **==========================================================
088        \*---------*/
089    /**
090     *  Determines the visibility token for this UML element.
091     *
092     *  @return The visibility token: '+' for a public element, '#' for a
093     *      protected one, '-' for a private, and '~' for package private
094     *      element.
095     */
096    protected final String determineVisibility()
097    {
098        var retValue = EMPTY_STRING;
099        final var modifiers = getModifiers();
100
101        //noinspection IfStatementWithTooManyBranches
102        if( modifiers.contains( PUBLIC ) )
103        {
104            retValue = modifiers.contains( DEFAULT ) ? "\u2A22 " : "+ ";
105        }
106        else if( modifiers.contains( PROTECTED ) )
107        {
108            retValue = "# ";
109        }
110        else if( modifiers.contains( PRIVATE ) )
111        {
112            retValue = "- ";
113        }
114        else
115        {
116            //---* The element is package private *----------------------------
117            retValue = "~ ";
118        }
119
120        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
121        return retValue;
122    }   //  determineVisibility()
123
124    /**
125     *  {@inheritDoc}
126     */
127    @Override
128    public final TypeElement getEnclosingElement() { return (TypeElement) super.getEnclosingElement(); }
129
130    /**
131     *  Renders
132     *  {@link SVGText}
133     *  element that will display this member.
134     *
135     *  @return The text element.
136     */
137    protected SVGText renderSVGText()
138    {
139        final var retValue = createText( toString() );
140
141        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
142        return retValue;
143    }   //  renderSVGText()
144
145    /**
146     *  {@inheritDoc}
147     */
148    @Override
149    public abstract String toString();
150
151    /**
152     *  Returns the
153     *  {@link SVGText}
154     *  element that will display this member.
155     *
156     *  @return The text element.
157     */
158    public final SVGText toText() { return m_Text.get(); }
159}
160//  class UMLMemberElement
161
162/*
163 *  End of File
164 */
